mapper.select: select d.departmentId,d.departmentName,s.staff_id,s.STAFF_NAME,tax_salary,insurance,endowment_insurance,medical_insurance,birth_insurance,unemployment_insurance,injury_insurance,housing_fund,B_withhold,endowment_insurance_d,medical_insurance_d,birth_insurance_d,unemployment_insurance_d,injury_insurance_d,housing_fund_d,subvention,Bonus,K_withhold,D_withhold from pay p left join staff_info s on p.staff_id=s.staff_id left join department d on p.departmentId=d.departmentId
select early,withhold,absent from hr_check where check_id=#{id}

select d.departmentId,d.departmentName,pp.positionId,pp.positionName,s.staff_id,s.STAFF_NAME,w.absenteeism,w.late,w.early_retreat from department d left join staff_info s on d.departmentId=s.departmentId left join work_register w on d.departmentId=w.departmentId left join position pp on d.departmentId=pp.departmentId group by s.staff_id

select d.departmentId,d.departmentName,pp.positionId,pp.positionName,s.staff_id,s.STAFF_NAME from staff_info s left join position pp on s.positionId=pp.positionId left join department d on pp.departmentId=d.departmentId

select d.departmentId,d.departmentName,pp.positionId,pp.positionName,s.staff_id,s.STAFF_NAME from staff_info s left join position pp on s.positionId=pp.departmentId left join department d on pp.departmentId=d.departmentId where s.staff_id=#{id}

select w.welfare_type,w.welfare_monery,w.goods,w.remark,d.departmentName,pp.positionName,s.STAFF_NAME,ww.absenteeism,ww.late,ww.early_retreat,p.tax_salary,p.insurance,p.endowment_insurance,p.medical_insurance,p.birth_insurance,p.unemployment_insurance,p.injury_insurance,housing_fund,p.B_withhold,p.endowment_insurance_d,p.medical_insurance_d,p.birth_insurance_d,p.unemployment_insurance_d,p.injury_insurance_d,p.housing_fund_d,p.subvention,p.Bonus,p.K_withhold,p.after_tax_salary,p.D_withhold from welfare w left join department d on w.departmentId=d.departmentId left join position pp on pp.departmentId=d.departmentId left join staff_info s on s.departmentId=d.departmentId left join work_register ww on ww.departmentId=d.departmentId left join hr_check c on c.work_id=ww.work_id left join pay p on p.departmentId=d.departmentId group by p.payid
select staff_id from staff_info where staff_id=#{id}

select d.departmentId,d.departmentName,pp.positionId,pp.positionName,s.staff_id,s.STAFF_NAME,p.payid,p.tax_salary,p.insurance,p.K_withhold,p.Bonus,p.K_withhold,p.subvention,p.after_tax_salary from pay p left join staff_info s on p.staff_id=s.staff_id left join department d on p.departmentId=d.departmentId left join position pp on p.positionId=pp.positionId

select d.departmentName,pp.positionName,s.STAFF_NAME,p.tax_salary,p.insurance,p.endowment_insurance,p.medical_insurance,p.birth_insurance,p.unemployment_insurance,p.injury_insurance,housing_fund,p.B_withhold,p.endowment_insurance_d,p.medical_insurance_d,p.birth_insurance_d,p.unemployment_insurance_d,p.injury_insurance_d,p.housing_fund_d,p.subvention,p.Bonus,p.K_withhold,p.after_tax_salary,p.D_withhold from pay p left join department d on p.departmentId=d.departmentId left join position pp on p.positionId=pp.positionId left join staff_info s on p.staff_id=s.staff_id where p.payid=#{id}
